data.title: ER/The Family Man
data.text:
This article about an episode needs to be expanded with more information.

Please help out by editing it.

The Family Man is the fifteenth episode of the fifteenth season of ER, and the three hundred twenty-fourth episode overall.

Starring: Parminder Nagra (Dr. Neela Rasgotra), John Stamos (Dr. Tony Gates), Linda Cardellini (Nurse Samantha Taggart), Scott Grimes (Dr. Archie Morris), David Lyons (Dr. Simon Brenner)

and Angela Bassett (Cate Banfield) (credit only)

Special Guest Stars: Louis Gossett Jr. (Leo Malcolm)

Guest Starring: Hedy Burress (Joanie Moore), Justina Machado (Claudia Diaz), Gil McKinney (Dr. Paul Grady), Ariel Winter (Lucy Moore), Laura Cer√≥n (Nurse Chuny Marquez), Troy Evans (Frank Martin), Michael Raymond-James (Stuart Moore), Montae Russell (Dwight Zadro), Tara Karsian (Liz Dade), Angel Laketa Moore (Nurse Dawn Archer), Bresha Webb (Dr. Laverne St. John)

Co-Starring: Cecilia Aguilar (Cecilia), Mark Fier (Philip), Mark Arthur Miller (Alan Jensen), Aedin Mincks (Kid #1), Luis Moncada (Rogelio), Nasty-Nes (Mooney), Stephanie Paliferro (Stephanie), Earnestine Phillips (Nancy), Roger Reaves (Roger), Kayla M. Simpkins (Kid #2), Toni Torres (Lorraine), Emily Wagner (Pickman), Ronald Winch (Ronnie)

Plot Overview

A mother gets involved in a car accident in the ambulance bay which seriously injures her and Brenner searches for a family member to take care of her young daughter; Neela tells Brenner that she got a job offer in North Carolina; Gates treats an elderly man who refuses treatment because he's worried that his condition will prolong his potential death; Morris impresses Claudia and her family members.
